status.description:
create NeuroDebian VM for CINN user
Please open the url https://@@{NeuroDebianService.address}@@:4443

action_list.description: Install NX
action_list.name: Install NX

attrs.script:
sudo dpkg -i /var/NX-install/nomachine-enterprise-terminal-server-evaluation_@@{NeuroDebianService.nomachine_version}@@_amd64.deb
sudo cp /var/NX-install/*.cfg /usr/NX/etc
sudo /usr/NX/bin/nxserver --restart
echo https://@@{address}@@:4443

attrs.script:
#echo @@{address}@@ `hostname` | \
#  sudo tee -a /etc/hosts 
sudo sed -i -e 's/@@{NeuroDebianService.image_hostname}@@/neurodebian-@@{calm_application_name}@@/' /etc/hosts
#sudo usermod -L act
if [ ! -z "@@{group}@@" ]
then
  gid=`getent group "@@{group}@@" | cut -f3 -d:`
  if [ ! -z "$gid" ]
  then
    sudo apt -y install sssd-tools
    for user in `getent group "@@{group}@@" | cut -f4 -d: | sed -e 's/,/ /g'`
    do
      sudo sss_override user-add $user -g $gid
    done
  fi
  sudo service sssd restart
fi
sudo dpkg -i /var/NX-install/nomachine-enterprise-terminal-server-evaluation_@@{NeuroDebianService.nomachine_version}@@_amd64.deb
sudo cp /var/NX-install/*.cfg /usr/NX/etc
sudo /usr/NX/bin/nxserver --restart
echo https://@@{address}@@:4443
sudo puppet apply /etc/puppet/manifests/node.pp 
#sudo rm /etc/sudoers.d/10_act
echo https://@@{address}@@:4443
